title: Improved 242Pu(n,g) thermal cross section combining activation and prompt gamma analysis

x4codes.hlp: Centre for Energy Research (EK), Budapest, Hungary
GSI Helmholtzzent. f. Schwerionenforschung, Darmstadt, Germany

x4codes.shortRef: Jour: European Physical Journal A: Hadrons and Nuclei, Vol.55, p.63 (2019)

x4codes.hlp: Centre for Energy Research (EK), Budapest, Hungary

x4freetext: Neutron guide line connected to a He-cooled
Average neutron energy of 12 meV (140 K)
on to Al backing (20 um) with a 50 nm Ti coating.
The weighted average of the cross sections from the
three method (activation method, PGAA single line
method, and PGAA unfolding method) gives the
average thermal capture cross secton=18.9+/-0.9 b.

x4headers.headerHelp: Energy of incident projectile, laboratory system

x4freetext: The 67 keV line was also measured but excluded
due to large uncertainty in decay intensity (50%).
